item.title: 习近平新一轮军事清洗是他推翻敌对集团以来范围最广的一次
item.description: 习近平主席第一次赶走几位高级将领，是为了清除共产党内的一个对立权力基础。现在，他甚至要除掉自己的一位忠实拥护者，这表明军方出现了新的问题。【原文：The first time President Xi Jinping ousted several top generals, he was removing a rival power base in the Communist Party. Now he’s even getting rid of one of his own loyalists, suggesting fresh problems with the military.】

item.title: 随着对印度央行放宽利率的希望升温，Nifty 大牛逼近 25,000 点
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 世界银行筹集创纪录的 1,000 亿美元援助最贫穷国家
item.description: 世界银行收到了通过其向最贫穷国家提供低息贷款和赠款的部门部署 1 000 亿美元的承诺。【原文：The World Bank received pledges to deploy a record of $100 billion via its unit focused on low-interest loans and grants to the poorest nations.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体称企业可以战胜挑战
item.description: 中国国家媒体在高层经济决策者召开重要会议前称，尽管面临国内需求疲软和残酷竞争等诸多不利因素，但中国企业的信心正在恢复。【原文：The confidence of Chinese companies is recovering despite a number of headwinds including weak domestic demand and cutthroat competition, state media said before key meetings of top economic decision-makers.】

item.title: 日本希望与特朗普举行包括削减汽车关税在内的会谈
item.description: 日本外相岩屋武表示，东京打算与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重启贸易谈判，并将取消汽车和汽车零部件关税列入议程。【原文：Japanese Foreign Minister Takeshi Iwaya said Tokyo intends to pick up trade talks with President-elect Donald Trump with an understanding that the elimination of tariffs on cars and auto parts will be on the agenda.】

item.title: 稀土提炼厂遭警告，伊鲁卡股价暴跌
item.description: 在摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示 Eneabba 稀土项目面临经济和执行风险之后，Iluka Resources Ltd. 股价暴跌达 10%，尽管该公司已从澳大利亚政府获得 4 亿澳元（2.58 亿美元）的新资金。【原文：Iluka Resources Ltd. shares tumbled as much as 10% after Morgan Stanley said the Eneabba rare earths project faces economic and execution risks, even after it received A$400 million ($258 million) in fresh funding from the Australian government.】

item.title: 寄望美联储降息的债券交易员从美国就业数据中寻找线索
item.description: 为美联储将在本月晚些时候降息的押注寻求支持的债券交易商将密切关注周五公布的美国 11 月份就业报告。【原文：Bond traders seeking support for bets that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this month will closely watch Friday’s US employment report for November.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆展示英语与特朗普建立友好关系
item.description: 墨西哥领导人用流利的英语与唐纳德-特朗普通了电话，这让他大吃一惊。【原文：Mexico’s leader surprised Donald Trump in a phone call by speaking in fluent English, an ability he’s rarely encountered with Latin American leaders.】

item.title: 中国股票基金击败 97% 的同行，押注廉价国企
item.description: 一位绩优的中国基金经理通过重点关注国有企业，在本地股过山车般的一年中击败了同行，他仍然看好这些企业，因为它们的估值较低。【原文：A top-performing Chinese fund manager, who has beaten peers in a roller-coaster year for local shares by focusing on state-owned firms, is still bullish on the cohort due to their low valuations.】

item.title: 华尔街银行预测中国十年来最大幅度降息
item.description: 华尔街多家银行认为，随着决策者加大力度支撑经济增长和遏制通货紧缩，中国央行明年将实施十年来最大幅度的降息。【原文：China’s central bank will deliver the biggest interest-rate cuts in a decade next year as policymakers intensify efforts to shore up growth and arrest deflation, in the view of a number of Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 温哥华市长提议将比特币纳入城市财政体系
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对加密货币的支持推动了比特币的飙升，温哥华可能会顺势将比特币纳入城市财政。【原文：Vancouver could move to integrate Bitcoin into city finances in the slipstream of the digital token’s surge to an all-time high above $100,000, a rally fueled by US President-elect Donald Trump’s support for crypto.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利王建宙称中国面临更多盈利不及预期风险
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，由于中国政府迄今采取的措施不足以扭转困扰经济的通货紧缩趋势，中国的企业盈利可能继续令人失望。【原文：Corporate earnings in China may continue to underwhelm as the measures taken by Beijing so far are insufficient to reverse the deflationary trend gripping the economy, according to Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 比特币短暂暴跌近 7%，交易商对冲回调风险
item.description: 在比特币历史性地飙升突破 100,000 美元导致一些交易商避险撤退之后，比特币在一天之内短时间内下跌了近 7%。【原文：Bitcoin dropped almost 7% for a short while a day after an historic surge past $100,000 led some traders to hedge for a retreat.】

item.title: 美国就业报告将显示风暴和罢工后雇佣反弹
item.description: 经济学家预计，在经历了上个月毁灭性的飓风和大罢工之后，美国 11 月份的招聘将出现反弹。【原文：Economists anticipate a rebound in US hiring in November following devastating hurricanes and a major strike in the previous month.】

item.title: 在可能影响美联储利率的就业数据公布前，黄金维持跌势
item.description: 在可能影响美联储利率政策的关键性美国就业报告公布之前，黄金保持跌势。【原文：Gold held a decline, ahead of a key US jobs report that may influence the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate policy.】

item.title: 日本基本工资创纪录增长，为日本央行加息敞开大门
item.description: 日本正式员工的基本工资创下了历史新高，这进一步表明日本正朝着积极的经济周期迈进，这将支持市场对央行近期加息的猜测。【原文：Base salaries for regular workers in Japan rose by a record, a further indication of progress toward a positive economic cycle that will support market speculation of a near-term rate hike by the central bank.】

item.title: 阿根廷央行因价格预期将利率降至 32
item.description: 由于通胀预期下降，阿根廷央行将基准利率下调 300 个基点至 32%。【原文：Argentina’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate by 300 basis points to 32% as inflation expectations fall.】

item.title: 欧佩克+再次推迟放宽供应限制计划，石油价格下跌
item.description: 在欧佩克+将逐步恢复停产的时间再推迟三个月后，石油交易量变化不大。【原文：Oil traded little changed after OPEC+ delayed the incremental revival of shuttered production by another three months.】

item.title: 联合健康枪击案引发医疗保险公司的深仇大恨
item.description: 美国联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：The shooting death of high-ranking UnitedHealth Group Inc. executive Brian Thompson has uncovered a deep anger among Americans who say the health insurance industry has too often failed to cover large medical bills and stood in the way of necessary care.】

item.title: 迈阿密海滩枫丹白露酒店在债券市场借款 9.75 亿美元
item.description: 迈阿密海滩豪华酒店枫丹白露出售了价值 9.75 亿美元的商业抵押担保证券，用于债务再融资。【原文：Luxury hotel Fontainebleau Miami Beach sold a $975 million commercial mortgage-backed security to refinance debt.】

item.title: 香港试管婴儿规则让人们进入卵子和胚胎黑市
item.description:
随着城市出生率的下降，生育援助的局限性正在造成压力。【原文：

As the city contends with a falling birth rate, the limits of reproductive assistance are causing strains.

】

item.title: 日本央行态度鹰派，廉价日元对日本股市的提振作用降至零
item.description: 长期以来，日元疲软对日本股市有利的说法可能最终会被打破，因为在全球货币政策出现分歧的情况下，日元与日本股市的相关性加速瓦解。【原文：The long-held precept that a weak yen is a good thing for Japanese stocks may finally be put to rest, as the breakdown in their correlation accelerates amid divergence in global monetary policy.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 公司完成最新一轮 60 亿美元融资
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 xAI 已筹集到 60 亿美元的新资金，结束了酝酿数月之久的一轮融资，据说该人工智能初创公司的估值超过 400 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk’s xAI has raised $6 billion in new capital, according to a regulatory filing, wrapping up a funding round that has been in the works for months and was said to value the artificial intelligence startup at more than $40 billion.】

item.title: 就业数据公布前，亚洲股市将追随美国股市跌势：市场综述
item.description: 周五，在就业数据有助于决定美联储是否会在 12 月降息之前，美国股市五个交易日以来首次下跌，亚洲股市也随之下跌。【原文：Asian equities were primed for declines Friday after US stocks fell for the first time in five sessions ahead of jobs data that will help determine whether the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in December.】

item.title: 淡水河谷贱金属公司管理层裁员数十人
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，淡水河谷公司（Vale SA）的贱金属子公司将解雇数十名管理人员，以简化公司结构，提高业绩。【原文：Vale SA’s base metals subsidiary will let go of dozens of managers to simplify its corporate structure and improve performance, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 私人信贷期待在并购浪潮中扩大规模
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 和 Blue Owl Capital Inc. 的高管表示，随着交易平均规模的扩大以及并购大门的打开，私人信用贷款机构明年的重点将是实现规模化。【原文：For private credit lenders, a focus next year will be on achieving scale, as the average size of transactions swell and the gates open for mergers and acquisitions, according to Blackstone Inc. and Blue Owl Capital Inc. executives.】

item.title: 谁是今年黄金狂飙的幕后推手？
item.description:
在这部彭博原创迷你纪录片中，我们将揭开闪亮金属屡创新高的神秘面纱，以及它对未来的意义。【原文：

In this Bloomberg Originals mini-documentary, we pull the curtain back on why that shiny metal keeps hitting record highs, and what it means for the future.

】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会以新规则回应中国对电信公司的攻击
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会周四提出了一套规则，要求电信运营商采取措施保护其网络免受网络安全威胁，因为有消息称，中国黑客很可能已在美国通信基础设施中潜伏数月之久，而且还没有结束的迹象。【原文：The US Federal Communications Commission proposed a set of rules Thursday that mandates carriers take steps to protect their networks against cybersecurity threats in the wake of revelations that Chinese hackers have likely been embedded in US communications infrastructure for months — with no end in sight.】

item.title: Aviva 接近与 Direct Line 达成初步协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Aviva Plc 即将达成收购 Direct Line Insurance Group Plc 的初步协议。【原文：Aviva Plc is nearing a preliminary agreement to acquire Direct Line Insurance Group Plc, as the UK motor insurer finally succumbs to a suitor after fending off takeover interest since early this year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 白爪生产商寻求增加现金，考虑重组
item.description: 据知情人士透露，生产 White Claw 和 Pabst Blue Ribbon 等酒精饮料的 City Brewing Co.【原文：City Brewing Co., which makes alcoholic drinks such as White Claw and Pabst Blue Ribbon, is seeking a new loan to boost cash while it explores a potential restructuring that could include a bankruptcy filing, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】
